creator: lee@kode.co.za
text:
rotatelogs usage message says I can do the following:

TransferLog "|../bin/rotatelogs /some/where 5M"

To do size based log rotation. But when it seems to be ignoring the M when I do:

CustomLog "|/usr/local/apache2/bin/rotatelogs /usr/local/apache2/logs/access_log
 50M" common

Running Apache 2.0.47 on Linux 2.4.20-8smp

Any help would be appreciated.

Regards,
Lee

I'm not able to verify this. Can you offer any additional details? Is the log
file getting created, and just not ever being rotated? When you say it's
ignoring the M, does that mean instead that it's rotating every 50 seconds? What
exactly is happening?
creator: rbowen@apache.org
rbowen@apache.org
text:
rotatelogs behaves for me exactly as described in the documentation, in the
situation described. Lee Engel <lee@kode.co.za> has not responded to my request
for further elaboration. (Contacted via this bug, and also via personal email.)
I'm inclined to go ahead and close the bug unless and until we hear back from
Lee Engel.
